attributes.action: Raise Tax/N.I contributions by £1 to give protected funds for NHS & Social Care.
attributes.additional_details:
We all benefit greatly from having the NHS available to us. We all have the responsibility to use it wisely, support those working in it & keep it public. 
The Institute for Fiscal Studies already warns that taxes will need to increase to 'combat the UK's persistent budget deficit' (P. Inman. The Guardian. 07/02/2017) If we, the general public, are willing to voluntarily ask for this increase, we must make it incumbent on politicians to ensure that it is RING FENCED for NHS & Social Care only.
attributes.background: Given the increasingly urgent reports of crisis in the NHS & Social Care sectors, with rise in demand and lower budgets, we urge all politicians to take immediate steps to allow the increase of Tax or NI contributions by £1, to provide PROTECTED funds for NHS & Social Care at point of delivery.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure whether you'd like everyone who pays income tax or National Insurance in the UK to pay an extra £1 every year, or whether you would like this to be a temporary increase. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
